More with dashboards & Map Viz

We will start thinking about maps & map projection, both in bqplot and matplotlib. Weâ€™ll start this week with building dashboards of mappable data.

Python Libraries

Data

The UFO Sitings Dataset (13Mb)

Data about world wide reports of UFO sitings

Surgery Charges Dataset (37Mb)

Surgery charges in different states

Earthquake sensor data (59Mb)

Earthquake sensor data from the earthquake from the Tohoku earthquake in 2011

Earthquake locations data (12Kb)

Locations of earthquake sensors
